articles.title: Eskom escalates power cuts to Stage 6 - eNCA
articles.description: Last year was South Africa's worst year of power cuts on record and it doesn't look like 2023 will be any better.
articles.content:
Not two weeks into the new year and SA has already spent over 200 hours in darkness.
Eskom has now escalated power cuts to Stage 6 at night.
Stage 4 blackouts will be implemented from 5am every mor… [+136 chars]

articles.title: HIV remains a leading killer in Africa despite medical breakthroughs—how to eliminate it - Medical Xpress
